title: Pixel 2: Screen will randomly not turn on
content:
My screen will randomly not turn on.

When I double click the power button, it vibrates like the camera is being turned on - but all i get is a black screen 
When I tap the power button, it vibrates like it is waking the screen - but all i get is a black screen 
When I use my fingerprint, it vibrates like it has just unlocked my phone - but all i get is a black screen 


I just did a factory reset - again, the depressing the power button for a few seconds - like turning on a new phone - results in a vibration of just having awoken the phone - but all i get is a black screen... 3 hrs later the screen finally tured on. 

After getting my phone set-back up - I switched my phone screen to "always on".... let's see if this fixes the problem.

Has anyone else had this issue? What is the real fix?
